signal_map.structure: Concentric arcs representing funnel stages with two overlaid rings containing numeric badges for metrics; lattice paths link channel nodes to measurement anchors.
elements: SKU chips placed on arcs to show exposure timing,
measurement anchors annotated with early-window share and event CPA values
signal_map.motion: Directional flow from outer discovery arc inward to conversion nodes, with thicker paths where early-window share rises and thinner paths where CPA increases.
signal_map.palette: Neutral base with cool blue for CPA and warm gold for early-window share; material cues: matte paper textures and translucent glass nodes.
signal_map.composition_cues: top-down flatlay geometry, subject less literal, emphasis on numeric badges inside rings
signal_map.reference: Measurement spine maps early-window share vs event CPA; encodes unified_target_pack goals
signal_map.alt: Head of Merchandising maps early-window share and event CPA across channels

case_studies.scene: A small conference table with split test boards: left side labeled '0% BNPL' and right side '15% sitewide promo', analytic printouts pinned above each.
case_studies.moment: Readout of A/B results where conversion lift under BNPL is compared to AOV and CPA under the promo.
props: receipt mockups annotated with fee and return notes

case_studies.lighting: Crisp, analytical highlights with deep contrast on data points
case_studies.reference: BNPL versus sitewide promos: the margin trade
case_studies.alt: Head of Finance reviews BNPL vs 15% promo A/B test conversion and CPA

case_studies.lighting: Warm editorial highlights to signal store energy with clear negative space
